attributes.action: DON'T BAN DOGS FROM PUBLIC PLACES IN KIRKLEES!!
attributes.additional_details: They are planning on banning dogs from playing areas and public areas in Kirklees, because of dog fouling. Where are the responsible dog owners meant to do? If they can't take their dog to places in Kirklees? My dog isn't tired just after a walk, she needs a RUN so where am I meant to take her?!
